Description:
Style & Quality
Immaculate presentation & style are just some of the key features this home has to offer. Superbly designed for family living with a flexible floor plan that allows the family to interact yet provides space for those who appreciate their privacy. From the moment you step inside you will be impressed what this family home has to offer. Comprising of ducted heating & evaporative cooling, large open plan kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the meals area with separate rumpus room, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite with double vanity, oversized shower and stone bench tops, open study/kids retreat, quality window furnishings, roller shutters, main bathroom, remote control double lock up garage with internal access, laundry packed with storage plus much more. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight, complete with under cover alfresco & surrounded by low maintenance landscaped gardens. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & adjacent to parkland. With all the amenities close by including a very short stroll to Stockland shopping centre, public transport & schools. You be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long, inspection will not disappoint!!
Insights: 19 Serenity Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Live At The Centre of Everything
First time offered for sale, much loved cherished over the years & impeccably presented, this proud double fronted brick veneer beauty lends itself perfectly to all home buyers & investors alike.
Quietly tucked away in a brilliant location close to Craigieburn Plaza, Craigieburn Secondary College, Our Lady's Primary School, bus stop and all-important amenities presents a unique & affordable home that will no doubt have you jumping for joy from the moment you step foot inside.
Brilliantly offering the lucky buyer 3 large bedrooms all with great storage, master with ensuite & walk-in robe, study/optional 4th bedroom, sparkling central bathroom, well-appointed kitchen with an abundance of cupboard & bench space, quality new appliances including dual ovens, adjoining meals area, spacious sun-drenched lounge & should you feel up for all-seasons entertaining outdoors, the home effortlessly links outside to a semi-enclosed pergola where large-scale family gatherings will be an absolute pleasure.
Jam-packed with extras such as ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 2x split system cooling units, ceiling fans, solar power, alarm, ample off-street parking, double brick garage, storage shed & spread out on approx 684m2!
If space, land & location are high on your agenda, then this home is sure to tick every single box on your must-have wish-list!
Insights: 15 Balcombe Court, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
The Future Starts Here
Convenient to cinemas, over 130 shops at Craigieburn Central, Aitken Creek walking/cycling trail, Splash Aqua Park and Craigieburn Sporting Club/18 hole golf course, this two bedroom home features an open design and offers an enticing opportunity for first home buyers, investors and more. A flowing living, dining and kitchen comes with a suite of stainless steel kitchen appliances encompassing a gas cooktop, electric oven, rangehood and dishwasher. A sliding glass door provides access to a courtyard, with storage shed, and the home's position on a curve results in extensive street frontage. Two double bedrooms host built-in robes, the bathroom has both a bath and separate shower, plus there's a conveniently separate toilet and a laundry. Further features include ducted heating, split system air conditioning, an individual driveway and automatic garage with storage and safe courtyard access.

Description:
Low Maintenance Town Living with Water Views!
Perfect for all home buyers or the astute investor, this home offers 3 bedrooms (master with balcony & stunning water views), central bathroom, sleek kitchen with caesar stone benchtops & stainless steel appliances, adjoining meals & family area leading out to an outdoor decked entertaining space with built-in bar.
Other features include: european laundry, heating, cooling, double remote garage with powder room & much more.
Positioned to please, opposite Highlands Lake, Water Side Cafe, and within minutes from Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, schools, sporting facilities, public transport & more. Whether you're a first home buyer or investor, this home packs a punch! Opportunity awaits!

Description:
Quality, Versatility and Exceptional Indoor / Outdoor Space
Ideally positioned in a quiet and convenient Hamilton Park cul-de-sac, this single-level home delivers an outstanding family lifestyle opportunity thanks to its free-flowing design, long list of features and expansive surrounds (land size approx 521sqm).
Perfect for growing families, the home's impeccably-presented interior boasts an extra-large master bedroom with walk-in robe and private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (both with BIRs) along with a main family bathroom and separate WC.
Spacious and versatile living zones include a light-filled lounge leading through to the fabulous open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen complete with gas cooktop and excellent storage/pantry space.
Other impressive highlights include ducted heating and split-system a/c, family-sized laundry and large linen cupboards, new carpets throughout, plus an al-fresco entertaining area and big backyard as well as the added advantage of an internally-accessed double garage with drive through access.
A short stroll to parks and playgrounds, it's also walking distance to Grand Boulevard buses, local shops, childcare centre and popular primary schools, as well as easy access to Craigieburn's major shopping centres and the Hume Freeway.
Insights: 29 Bowral Loop, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Impressive Parcel of Land- Mt. Ridley Estate
Build your dream home today in Mt. Ridley Estate on this 501m2 (approx.), titled parcel of land offering an impressive frontage & located in the highly sought after pocket of Craigieburn. Whether you are looking at getting into the market for the first time, building your dream home or growing your investment portfolio this block is the one for you.
With schools, Highlands's Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Central, parks and public transport all within close proximity it is an ideal location for someone looking at investing or someone looking to build their dream home.
Located in Mt Ridley, The outlook will offer residents all the benefits of an elevated position. There are walking and bike trails and fitness stations through nearby parkland, top level sports facilities for football and tennis nearby and a new aquatic centre underway.
Do not wait to enquire about this block as it will not hang around for long!
Call us today!
Preet Brar 0416 085 144
Simran Khatrha 0431 178 435

Description:
Modern Living At It's Finest !!!!
This modern design 4 bedroom oasis, offers the discerning buyer a rare opportunity to secure the ultimate residence situated on 482sqm approx amongst some of Craigieburn most sought after addresses . Its an opportunity not to be missed with walking distance to Highlands shopping centre ,Highlands hotel and transport and parks and close proximity to Schools makes this home even more desirable.
The Grand proportions and exquisite detail are evident throughout. From the moment you enter the home, you are greeted with a wide entrance porch which flows through to chic formal sitting room where dramatic 3 metre high ceilings are the feature. 800*800 Spanish tiles throughout the Expansive open plan living/dining which open to a sublime private and perfectly landscaped garden and entertaining alfresco area.The private main spacious master bedroom featuring a luxurious fully tiled en-suite and oversized walk in robe .An additional three generous bedrooms all with built in robes, further compliment this beautiful family home. Bathrooms are lavish with premium stone and European fittings.The Kitchen includes a butlers pantry and waterfall island stone benchtop in the middle looking over the main living area with an excuisite fireplace giving a warm feel .The double garage floor is fully tiled and also comes with an in built kitchen and toilet and can be used as a third living area.
If you are lucky enough to grab this opportunity and are handed the keys to this exceptional property, you could live the lavishes that Family life has to offer. With Relaxed Décor and Seamless indoor - outdoor living spaces, light filled open plan throughout the well-crafted floor plan that allows each spacious area to flow effortlessly with plenty of room for everyone.
Other features include:
Heating and Cooling
Alarm and intercom
Fully tiled bathrooms
3 metre ceilings
Stone benchtops
Security cameras
Exposed aggregate driveway
Remote garage
Downlights
Ducted Vacuum
Make sure you inspect this one .

Description:
Sheer Brilliance, Quality & Perfection!
Showcasing meticulous presentation, designer-inspired finishes & high-end credentials, this showpiece family residence is simply breathtaking.
Astutely designed, maximising space, light & functionality, it features a sophisticated entry, formal lounge, expansive open plan family space, dining area & vogue kitchen extending onto an all-weather alfresco, set amidst low maintenance landscaped gardens with plenty of room for kids to play until their heart's content.
Resplendent in top-of-the-range appointments, including high ceilings, heightened doors, dishwasher, great storage thanks to a large pantry, substantial stone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, the kitchen is truly sublime.
Comprising of 4 stunning bedrooms, all complete with fitted built-in robes, sparkling central bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles. A large master bedroom which features a generous walk-in-robe & impressive ensuite.
Highlights include luxury central bathroom, engineered floors, ducted-heating, zoned refrigerative cooling, alarm, CCTV & video-intercom, roomy laundry with excellent storage & automated double garage/in-home access.
This home needs to be on your must-inspect list!

Description:
Timeless and Quality.
Boasting a premier "Parkside Rise" address and enjoying stunning uninterrupted views from the Dandenong Ranges right across to the West including an amazing Melbourne city skyline. This architect designed Tri-level home is packed with quality features and has been enjoyed by its only owners for almost 20 years, as a chapter closes for them a unique opportunity presents for one lucky family. At entry level you are greeted by lovely polished timber floors and staircase flanked by a formal lounge and study, upstairs to the main living zone comprising a spacious and quality timber kitchen with lovely granite bench tops and s/steel appliances, adjacent dining and informal living areas and the master bedroom and entertaining deck, all designed to encompass the spectacular views. Lower level features 2 more spacious bedrooms and 2nd living zone all serviced by a central bathroom. Out to a paved entertaining area, even from ground level still enjoy wonderful city views, plenty of garden thanks to the large parcel of land (1017m2 approx) and a large drive through garage. Only a short walk across the park to Hume Anglican Grammar or stroll down the hill if it's a primary school you need, a short drive to Craigieburn Station and major shopping at Craigieburn Central.
Don't miss this rare opportunity to purchase in Craigieburn's "most desired" location.
Sale by Fixed Date; Tuesday 3rd of September at 6:00pm.
Insights: 45 Parkside Rise, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Attn: All Investors.
Currently UNDER CONTRACT.
This property has an excellent fixed term tenant until Dec 2019.
Comprising four bedrooms (one large downstairs) with the master bedroom upstairs complete with en suite, WIR and a private balcony overlooking the Aitken Creek Wetlands. Relax to the beautiful birdsong from the large variety of bird life that have made this area home.
The central bathroom is also upstairs servicing the remaining two bedrooms and there is a powder room downstairs.
A tiled open plan kitchen/living/meals area opens to your own private courtyard.
Additional features include a double remote controlled garage, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, plus high ceiling in the living area.
All of this is situated close to Craigieburn Central, Aqua Park and Leisure Centre and the Waterside Cafe.
If you thought purchasing 4 bedrooms, 2 bathroom and double garaging was out of reach then think again. This is your opportunity to purchase a sensibly priced property that you can add to your investment portfolio. This property is rented at approx $390 per week.
Viewing is by appointment only, to suitably qualified buyers.
Call today to discuss your options.

Description:
Renovated home with lots of potentials
Sitting on a huge block size of approximately 647m2 within walking distance to Craigieburn Train Station and Craigieburn Central and all major shopping essentials, chemist, doctors clinics, restaurants and so much more.
From start to end you'll be impressed with a free flowing simple floor plan its all sunshine and roses.
The fully renovated Home Consists of the following:
Master bedroom with BIR, 2 other spacious bedrooms with BIR's and the convenience of a central bathroom to share. For family or guests take advantage of a living area and also a lounge room which over looks a separate meal area and stunning kitchen
Outdoor living doesn't get better for entertaining with this huge outdoor sun room area that has the convenience of using it all year round rain, hail or shine the parties or relaxing doesn't need to stop.
Fixtures and Fittings include: Top of the range stainless steel oven and cook top, dishwasher, ducted heating and cooling, timber flooring throughout, intercom system, security cameras, down lights and so much more.

Description:
Prized Location Family Home
A must-see for families that love privacy and space - with its charm, elite location and outstanding potential it will be sure to tick all the boxes! This much loved and meticulously maintained family home is set out on an impressive 700m2 (approx.) land.
An entertainer's delight, this home is sure to impress. Featuring 4 bedrooms plus study (or potential 5th bedroom). The large master bedroom has a walk-in robe and private ensuite, further complemented by 3 generous sized bedrooms, all with built-in robes, central family bathroom and a separate toilet.
A well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher accompany the open plan family and living areas, which lead onto the spacious rumpus/theatre room with sliding doors leading out to an expansive entertaining deck area. Formal occasions are also ticked off with this family pleaser, as it features a spacious formal living area.
Other features of the home include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, solar power 1.5KW, laundry, sizeable backyard and double garage complete with drive-through option to the rear.
Centrally located with public transport next door and only moments away from parks, local shops, childcare centre, swim school, primary/secondary schools and not to mention it offers easy access to Craigieburn Central, Hume Freeway and much more!
Quick to inspect, as this one won't last long!

Description:
IF YOU THOUGHT THE LOCATION WAS GOOD, WAIT TIL YOU SEE INSIDE
Conveniently positioned in a highly central locale, this superbly presented and highly appealing home is one you should not miss.
Complimented by a sunlit free flowing design, this superbly presented brick home will suit the astute buyer/investor looking to acquire a tasteful property in a great neighborhood.
Comprising an expansive light filled living/dining space, practical kitchen with breakfast bench which flows onto intimate meals area and comfortable lounge. The sizable backyard is neatly configured and allows ample space for kids to roam.
Serving all the family needs are three well positioned robed bedrooms including a large master with ensuite and walk in robe. Central bathroom, separate laundry with large storage space and single car garage with remote/internal access.
Within walking distance Mount Ridley College, Child care facilities, Highgate Recreation Reserve, Highlands Shopping Centre and much more.

Convenience At Your Doorstep
Perfectly located in the heart of Highlands estate, this spacious 4-bedroom home features a versatile floor-plan with privacy and entertainment in mind. Lovingly presented and well maintained this 6-year-old home is sure to suit all types of buyers. Located within a short stroll to primary and secondary schools, public transport, Child care centre, Community centre and parks. Also having the added convenience of being only a short drive away from Highlands Shopping Centre, Craigieburn station and the famous Splash aqua park. With Ease of access to the Hume Hwy and Western Ring Rd through Craigieburn bypass.

· 4 Bedrooms with built in robes

· Open plan living and meals

Description:
Size, Location and Charm!
On a vast fully-landscaped allotment (approx 680m2) in one of Craigieburn's most sought after pockets, This imposing residence with amazing street appeal displays an elegant fusion of period presence and contemporary flair. Featuring five large bedrooms (master with WIR and en-suite), equally-stylish main bathroom and separate powder room. Add to this an elegant formal lounge and adjoining dining room leading through to the open-plan living/meals area enhanced by a very well equipped kitchen and ample cupboard space. Other stand-out features include a modern family-size laundry, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm and CCTV and a double lock up garage with drive through access. An expansive backyard tops off this stunning family home with perfect location, it's walking distance to every amenity Craigieburn has to offer.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Fine Family Credentials in a Perfect Position!
Distinctive architecture, impressive design and versatile living/entertaining spaces illustrate the appeal of this single-level sensation delivering a brilliant family environment that's ready to simply move in and enjoy.
Feature-packed interior showcases 4 genuinely large bedrooms (3 with BIRs, master with WIR), private ensuite with double vanity, stylish main family bathroom and guest powder room.
Truly setting the home apart are its multiple living zones including a light-filled lounge, large theatre room or rumpus and expansive open-plan living/dining area enhanced by a superb stone-bench kitchen complete with breakfast bar, stainless steel appliances and butler's pantry.
Other highlights include high ceilings throughout with efficient LED downlights, ducted heating, plantation shutters, family-sized laundry and dedicated linen storeroom, plus a spacious al-fresco entertaining deck, wide low-maintenance backyard and remote-control double garage with internal entry.
Malcolm Creek trails and parkland at the end of the street, it's also walking distance to Mount Ridley College and Windrock Avenue buses, as well as easy access to both Highlands and Craigieburn Central shopping centres

Description:
Inspired Design, Impressive Luxury
Near new and ready to move in, this luxury family residence offers modern design with a high level finish and spectacular proportions with accommodating yard.
Wonderful first impression upon entry with a spacious foyer, great size study, wide entrance hall leading to the sensational living and dining areas either side of a premium gourmet kitchen boasting stone benches with waterfall edge, stainless appliances, undermount sink, wide fridge/freezer space, butler's pantry and a stunning timber feature bulk head above the island bench. The living spaces extend out to a cosy outdoor al fresco and landscaped private garden.
Generous proportions continue upstairs through the lavish main bedroom with walk in robe and stunning ensuite, a balcony, guest/4th bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, two further bedrooms with built in robes, a stylish designer bathroom and comfortable retreat area.
This grand family home is located just 5 minutes walk to Craigieburn village shops, cafes and childcare. Highlands Shopping Centre and Mount Ridley College are only short drive away..
Features include, heating and cooling, stainless steel appliances, remote double garage with gas available for second kitchen, built in TV unit, ducted vacuum, video intercom, dishwasher, alarm system butlers pantry and so much more to mention. Dont miss out!
